name: Schwarzschild (TETHORAX)
description:
JOURNEY THROUGH A BLACK HOLE

Enter a place in space where gravity pulls so much that even light can not get out.

Propel your black hole to absorb smaller ones, but avoid larger black holes or they will absorb you!

If you have trypophobia or melanoheliophobia then get out before the black hole eats you.

This is meant to be an offiline, hyper-casual, mobile game, designed to kill your time so expect the dimensions to resemble a phone (in full 4K). For the full mobile experience you can download the app on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.schwarzschild.game
